message: Let's make a deal! This offer leaves us both with a good amount. What do you say, Bob?
Let's split it fairly, I'll take a bit more since I'm losing value each round.

Okay, Bob, let's try this again. My last offer was generous, but I'm willing to compromise. This deal still gives you a decent share, and remember, it loses value for you with every round. Time is ticking!
I'm taking a bit more this time since I've lost 19% of the value already. I think this is still a reasonable split.
Bob, this is getting serious! I'm lowering my demand again to be fair, but we need to close this soon. You're losing money with every 'no'! What do you say?
I've lost over a third of the value, so I need a bigger share. This is my most generous offer yet, considering my losses.
Bob, we're running out of time! I'm making another compromise here, but I can't go much lower. You're losing serious money with each passing round. Let's be smart and get this deal done!
